classic thing your calendar comes up it's 10 o'clock in the morning and it says hey you've got a meeting I've got
to dial this phone number I've got to file the find the meeting pin and you end up five minutes late to your meeting
um chime fixes that problem all you've got to do when you're inviting your meeting attendees is add the meet chime
AWS email address uh along with your other attendees at the time that the
meeting is scheduled to start they'll automatically get a a popup a call if you will that they can click to join

troubleshooting um and then I can also um take advantage of some of the

on the go addition features of those meetings
include video conferencing um you can add video chat to an existing meeting with just a single click um on the

cisos or uh polycom devices that you may already have um I know we're also all very
